tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: TikTok: Murder Gone Viral - The Killing of Tristyn Bailey
programme.desc: Documentary series. This episode explores the death of All-American cheerleader Tristyn Bailey, who was killed by 14-year-old Aiden Fucci in 2021.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Champions: Full Gallop
programme.desc: Documentary series. 70,000 fans pack Aintree for the Grand National - with one million pounds at stake, a new hero may yet emerge in racings most iconic race.

programme.title: Ainsleys Good Mood Food
programme.desc: Ainsley is feeling fruity in this episode as his recipes include a wonderful Wandsworth Mess and a rose harissa chicken tagine with apricots and chickpeas.

programme.title: James Martins Spanish Adventure
programme.desc: James meets a family who live off-grid in Asturias, samples fabada stew and Urbies cheese, visits a restaurant famous for its sardines and cooks a steak sandwich.

programme.title: James Martins Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is joined in the kitchen by TV property experts Scarlette and Stuart Douglas while also enjoying recipes from chefs Tommy Banks and Kenny Atkinson.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan are Sir Brian May, Phil Tufnell, and Denise Black to provide the chat while horticulturalist Camilla Bassett-Smith shows how to heat up greenhouses.

programme.title: Fletchers Family Farm
programme.desc: Documentary series. Its all systems go as preparations build for the Royal Cheshire Show, and the community spirit is in full force as Kelvin swaps his wellies for rugby boots.

programme.title: Talking Royals
programme.desc: A round-up of royal news with expert analysis from ITV News Royal Editor Chris Ship, ITV News royal expert Lizzie Robinson and a host of guests.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents coverage of racing from Cheltenham and Fontwell where the third and final day of the 2025 November Meeting at Cheltenham is the feature meeting.

programme.title: European Qualifier: Albania v England
programme.desc: Mark Pougatch is joined by Ian Wright and Roy Keane for coverage of the final match of Englands successful FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifying campaign as they face Albania.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: A look back at the game shows most thrilling end games as plucky players and famous faces alike take on the machine for its jackpot.

programme.title: Bullseye
programme.desc: Three more teams take on the classic darts-based game show as world number one Luke Humphries partners with host Freddie Flintoff to try to complete a charity challenge.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: Im a Celebrity... is back as a new group of celebrities arrive in Australia in the hope of being crowned as the King or Queen of the Jungle.

programme.title: Sorry, I Didnt Know
programme.desc: Chizzy Akudolu hosts as Stephen Bailey, Ola Labib, Dinesh Nathan and Susan Wokoma join team leaders Richard Blackwood and Eddie Kadi to go on a tour of Black British history.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: TikTok: Murder Gone Viral - The Killing of Brianna Ghey
programme.desc: Documentary series. With unique access, this episode follows the investigation which led to two convictions for 16-year-old Brianna Gheys murder.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Silverstone with racing from the Wera Tools F4 British Championship certified by FIA and the Porsche Sprint Challenge Great Britain.

programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Fletchers Family Farm
programme.desc: Documentary series. Its all systems go as preparations build for the Royal Cheshire Show, and the community spirit is in full force as Kelvin swaps his wellies for rugby boots.

programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz gossip.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Join the Loose Women team as they interview celebrity guests and discuss topical issues.

programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Working out the words this time are Londoners Angela and her daughter Vizella, mates Marcus and Liam from West Sussex, and auntie and niece Kate and Freya from Surrey and Herts.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Nick is in the hot seat as he plays the game with just one question - join Stephen Mulhern to see if he navigates his way through the Bankers mind games or fall into a trap.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh guides Michael from Chipping Campden, Philip from Radlett, Nichole from London and Ajay from Chalfont St Peter as they take on a Chaser in a battle of wits.

programme.title: STV News at Six
programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: April makes a difficult phone call, Kammy plans a housewarming party, and Robert is feeling guilty.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Theo puts the final nail into the coffin of Todds career, Tim despairs when Sally confronts Trisha with her suspicions, and Carl jumps at the chance to offload Alfie.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: As the new batch of celebrities get used to their new surroundings, they must take on trials and challenges in the hope of winning food for the camp.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesnt matter if youre not usually good at quizzes because the questions are all about logic and common sense.
